name: Zero Gravity Adventure Simulator
description:
What's between you and your dreams? A single jump. 

When gravity is not an option, all it takes is a little step and boom, you are free to believe in yourself once again.

Have no fear. The journey will end, and you'll discover way more than what you are ready to accept.

Controls:
every key/click/tap: jump

Song: Moon Theme (Ducktales remastered)

Let your dreams come true
